Issue.summary: Fix deploy/upgrade error message in vscc
Issue.description: Currently, during chaincode deploy or upgrade, when more than the required number of entries present in the lscc write set, vscc throws an error like _LSCC can only issue a single putState upon deploy/upgrade_ We need to differentiate the error message by specifically mentioning either _deploy_ or _upgrade_ but not both
